name: Sam's Sweet-And-Hot Soup
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound squid, cleaned and sliced into matchsticks
1 pound shrimp, cleaned, deveined and diced
1 cup bamboo shoots, drained and sliced into matchsticks

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the broth, sugar, vinegar, salt, black pepper and soy sauce and bring nearly to a boil. Add 1 cup of this broth to the cornstarch, whisk well and then slowly and carefully stir this slurry into the soup. Reduce the heat to a simmer.

Add the squid, shrimp, tofu, bamboo shoots and mushrooms and cook for 3 minutes. Whisk the egg whites and sesame oil together and stir into the soup. Ladle into bowls, garnish with minced scallions and serve immediately.
